summary: Die Welt is an audacious hybrid between fiction and documentary, showing contemporary Tunisia shortly after the Jasmine revolution in 2011.
cast: Abdelhamid Nawara|Ilse Heus|Judith Van der Meulen|Mohsen Ben Hassen|Rahma Ben Hassen|Marwa Agrebi|Slim Al Amiri|Houcem Al Bib|Brahim Ben Ammar|Mehdi Ben Amor|Ons Bahri|Mariem Bedoui|Mohammed Hassine Belkhala|Kamel Ben Khalfa|Abdelmajid Bibasse|Mohamed Chaouachi|Fouad Cheneti|Mehdi Cheneti|Bilel Chouchene|Hana El Wafi|Fakhreddine Essraoulia|Jamil Ferchichi|Fethi Fourti|Ahmed Gaidi|Nacer Edinne Hafsi|Youssef Hammami|Delilah Ben Hassen|Nebila Ben Hassen|Abdelmajid Houidi|Sami Jouini|Mustapha Khemiha|Taher Khemiri|Davy Eduard King|Walid Korbi|Med Chams Eddine Kotrane|Lassad Mestiri|Margaretha Nilsson|Mohammed Nkhili|Walid Ouerghi|Abderrahmen Rezgui|Afifa Rezgui|Mounir Saadoui|Semira Saidi|Imed Sassi|Aymen Sliti
title: Die Welt
